author: Alia
text:

author: Alia
text: Thank you AP Dhillon for spending 38 minutes with me this year on @Spotify. You are my #1. #SpotifyWrapped https://t.co/4mRX8o1MmT

author: Alia
text: If potential superstars like this @iamamirofficial are stepping down at such a young age and who have such a long way to go then there's something really screwed with our system that needs to be sorted. #AmirTakeRetirementBack  #Amir

author: Alia
text: We, as a society,need to start building tolerance that lets us accept, without judgement,that there are people in this world whose set of priorities and preferences don't match ours and that is OK because God made us all unique and NOTHING gives 'us' the right to condemn anybody.

author: Alia
text: What men don't realize as men is that a woman would do anything they ask, if they ask it with love instead of as a ruling authority, ten times better, more consistently, for the sheer reason of it making you happy. But nai. Have to be male, over bearing, ordering bitches.
